title: Pixel 1 XL suddenly died while being used and working completely fine?
content:
Yesterday evening I was watching a YouTube video on my Pixel 1 XL when suddenly the screen got stuck, I figured it crashed so I forced the mobile to turn off by pressing and holding the power button after which it won't turn on again or response to anything at all. 
I charged the Pixel the whole night to try again today, but the phone is still completely unresponsive.
I have held the power button for +30sec with and without volume down and up and together, every combination, still no response after many times.

When connecting the charger to a wall outlet or laptop it's also unresponsive. The laptop does mention something being connected, but the phone is off so I am unable to do anything.

Did the phone just randomly die on me while it was being used and working completely fine?
I live in a country without authorized Google repair partner's, what do I do?
